nodes.text: Signal Interruption was a web enhancement published at Wizards.com on August 9, 2001 for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game, to be used with the Invasion of Theed adventure game and the The Dark Side Sourcebook.
Criminal Raymas Daal, working for the Trade Federation, hires a group of independent operatives to deactivate a Naboo sensor array shortly before the Federation's invasion of the planet.
